openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Sample API
  version: undefined
paths:
  /resource1:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Resource 1'
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                name: a Name
                length: 2999
              schema:
                $ref: 'complexType.json'
      operationId: GET_resource1
  /resource2:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Resource 2'
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                id: an id
                field1:
                  id: an id
                  name: a Name
              schema:
                $ref: 'complexType.yaml'
      operationId: GET_resource2
  /resource3:
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: 'Resource 3'
          content:
            application/json:
              example:
                id: an id
                name: a Name
              schema:
                $ref: 'baseType.yaml'
      operationId: GET_resource3
